refnamediv.refpurpose: Used for parameter comunication to and from a VST plugin.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: vstparamset and vstparamget are used for parameter comunication to and from a VST plugin.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: instance - the number which identifies the plugin, to be passed to other vst4cs opcodes.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kparam - The number of the parameter to set or get.
kvalue - the value to set, or the the value returned by the plugin.

Parameters vary according to the plugin. To find out what parameters are available, use the verbose option when loading the plugin with vstinit. Note that the VST protocol specifies that all parameter values must lie between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive.
